```{python}
import numpy as np
from matplotlib import pyplot as plt
ats = np.array([0, 0, 10, 25, 35, 35])
iats = np.diff(ats)
iats_d = np.diff(iats)

f"ats = {ats}, iats = {iats}, iats_d={iats_d}"
```

```{python}
plt.plot(iats, label="iats")
plt.plot(iats_d,label="iats_d")
plt.legend()
plt.show()
```
